name: Caffeine
notes: Common stimulant; avoid use late in the day. Builds tolerance.

name: L-Theanine
notes: Amino acid; synergizes well with caffeine. Promotes calm focus.

name: Magnesium Glycinate
notes: Highly bioavailable form of magnesium. Take before bed for better sleep.

name: Ashwagandha
notes: Adaptogenic herb; reduces stress and anxiety. Take with food.

name: Rhodiola Rosea
notes: Adaptogen; improves energy and reduces fatigue. Best taken morning.

name: Creatine Monohydrate
notes: Enhances physical and cognitive performance. Take daily for best results.

name: Omega-3 Fish Oil
notes: Anti-inflammatory; supports brain health. Take with meals.

name: Melatonin
notes: Sleep hormone; take 30-60 min before bed. Start with low dose.

name: Vitamin D3
notes: Essential vitamin; supports immune and bone health. Take with fat.

name: B-Complex
notes: Essential B vitamins; supports energy metabolism. Take morning.

name: Alpha-GPC
notes: Choline source; enhances focus and memory. Can cause headaches.

name: Bacopa Monnieri
notes: Memory enhancer; requires weeks for full effect. Take with food.

name: Lion's Mane Mushroom
notes: Neuroprotective mushroom; may enhance nerve growth.

name: Cordyceps
notes: Mushroom; improves energy and athletic performance.

name: CoQ10
notes: Cellular energy support; take with fat-containing meal.

name: NMN or NR (NAD+ Precursor)
notes: Supports cellular energy and longevity. Morning preferred.

name: Zinc
notes: Essential mineral; supports immune function. Don't exceed 40mg/day.

name: Probiotics
notes: Gut health support; take on empty stomach or with food per brand.

name: Curcumin (Turmeric)
notes: Anti-inflammatory; take with black pepper for absorption.

name: Glutathione
notes: Master antioxidant; liposomal form best for absorption.

name: Taurine
notes: Amino acid; supports cardiovascular and neurological health.

name: Glycine
notes: Amino acid; improves sleep quality. Take before bed.

name: Phosphatidylserine
notes: Phospholipid; supports cognitive function and reduces cortisol.

name: Mucuna Pruriens
notes: Natural L-DOPA source; use cautiously, can affect dopamine.

name: 5-HTP
notes: Serotonin precursor; may improve mood and sleep. Evening use.

name: GABA
notes: Calming neurotransmitter; unclear if crosses blood-brain barrier.

name: CBD Oil
notes: Non-psychoactive cannabinoid; may reduce anxiety and pain.

name: Berberine
notes: Blood sugar support; take with meals. Similar to metformin.

name: Agmatine Sulfate
notes: Arginine metabolite; mood and neuroprotection. May affect tolerance.

name: Bromantane
notes: Russian nootropic; improves motivation and energy. Prescription in some areas.

name: Phenibut
notes: GABAergic; highly addictive. Use sparingly (1-2x/week max).

name: Memantine
notes: NMDA antagonist; prescription. Tolerance prevention.

name: Modafinil
notes: Prescription wakefulness agent; avoid afternoon use.

name: Nicotine
notes: Highly addictive stimulant; use gum or patches, not smoking.

name: Pregabalin (Lyrica)
notes: Prescription GABAergic; tolerance and dependence risk.

name: Piracetam
notes: Original racetam; subtle cognitive enhancement. Pair with choline.

name: Aniracetam
notes: Fat-soluble racetam; may reduce anxiety and improve creativity.

name: Noopept
notes: Potent peptide nootropic; take sublingually or orally.

name: Semax
notes: Peptide; intranasal admin; cognitive enhancement and neuroprotection.

name: Selank
notes: Anxiolytic peptide; intranasal admin; reduces anxiety.

name: BPC-157
notes: Healing peptide; research compound. Injectable or oral.

name: N-Acetyl Cysteine (NAC)
notes: Glutathione precursor; antioxidant and mucolytic.

name: SAMe
notes: Methylation support; mood and joint health. Morning use.

name: St. John's Wort
notes: Natural antidepressant; many drug interactions. Avoid with SSRIs.

name: Kava
notes: Anxiolytic herb; liver toxicity risk with long-term use.

name: Valerian Root
notes: Sleep aid; may cause drowsiness. Take before bed.

name: Lemon Balm
notes: Calming herb; mild anxiolytic and sleep aid.

name: Ginkgo Biloba
notes: Circulation and cognitive support; blood thinner.

name: Panax Ginseng
notes: Energy and cognitive enhancer; may increase blood pressure.

name: Maca Root
notes: Peruvian root; energy and hormonal balance.

name: Tribulus Terrestris
notes: May support testosterone; libido enhancement.

name: Tongkat Ali
notes: Herbal testosterone booster; stress reduction.

name: Fenugreek
notes: May support testosterone and blood sugar.

name: Forskolin
notes: May support fat loss and testosterone.

name: Yohimbine
notes: Alpha-2 antagonist; fat loss and libido. Can cause anxiety.

name: EGCG (Green Tea Extract)
notes: Antioxidant catechin; metabolic and brain health.

name: Resveratrol
notes: Polyphenol antioxidant; longevity and cardiovascular.

name: Quercetin
notes: Flavonoid; anti-inflammatory and immune support.

name: Apigenin
notes: Flavonoid from chamomile; calming and sleep support.

name: Luteolin
notes: Flavonoid; anti-inflammatory and neuroprotective.

name: Sulforaphane
notes: From broccoli sprouts; detox and longevity support.

name: Spirulina
notes: Blue-green algae; nutrient-dense superfood.

name: Chlorella
notes: Green algae; detox and immune support.

name: Collagen Peptides
notes: Protein; supports skin, joints, and gut health.

name: Whey Protein
notes: Complete protein; muscle building and recovery.

name: Beta-Alanine
notes: Increases muscle carnosine; may cause tingling.

name: L-Citrulline
notes: Nitric oxide precursor; pumps and blood flow.

name: L-Arginine
notes: Nitric oxide precursor; less effective than citrulline.

name: L-Carnitine
notes: Fat metabolism; energy production.

name: L-Tyrosine
notes: Dopamine and norepinephrine precursor; stress resilience.

name: L-Tryptophan
notes: Serotonin precursor; mood and sleep. Evening use.

name: L-Ornithine
notes: May improve sleep quality and reduce fatigue.

name: DMAE
notes: Choline precursor; may enhance focus and mood.

name: Huperzine A
notes: Acetylcholinesterase inhibitor; memory enhancement.

name: Vinpocetine
notes: Cerebral blood flow enhancer; cognitive support.

name: PQQ
notes: Mitochondrial biogenesis; neuroprotection.

name: Pterostilbene
notes: Similar to resveratrol; better bioavailability.

name: Astaxanthin
notes: Powerful antioxidant; eye and skin health.

name: Lutein
notes: Carotenoid; eye health and macular protection.

name: Zeaxanthin
notes: Carotenoid; eye health support.

name: Beta-Carotene
notes: Vitamin A precursor; antioxidant.

name: Vitamin C
notes: Essential vitamin; immune and antioxidant support.

name: Vitamin E
notes: Fat-soluble antioxidant; heart and skin health.

name: Vitamin K2
notes: Bone and cardiovascular health; pair with D3.

name: Calcium
notes: Essential mineral; bone health. Take with D3 and K2.

name: Iron
notes: Essential mineral; oxygen transport. Test before supplementing.

name: Selenium
notes: Antioxidant mineral; thyroid support.

name: Iodine
notes: Essential for thyroid hormone production.

name: Manganese
notes: Trace mineral; bone and metabolic health.

name: Copper
notes: Trace mineral; balance with zinc supplementation.

name: Chromium
notes: Blood sugar regulation support.

name: Molybdenum
notes: Trace mineral; sulfur metabolism.

name: Boron
notes: Trace mineral; bone and hormone support.

name: Silica
notes: Connective tissue and bone health.

name: Choline Bitartrate
notes: Essential nutrient; brain and liver health.

name: Inositol
notes: May help with anxiety and PCOS. Evening use.

name: Biotin (Vitamin B7)
notes: Hair, skin, and nail support.

name: Folate (Methylfolate)
notes: Essential B vitamin; DNA synthesis and methylation.

name: Vitamin B12 (Methylcobalamin)
notes: Essential vitamin; energy and nerve health.
